column3: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee no si Edom he do
column4: mekyerɛ Zin sar do pomu afamu
column5: wɔ pomu afamu ekyir noho ara."

column2: "Na hɔn pomu afamu he no hyɛ ase fi Nkyen Po no n'ano a obu fa pomu afamu noho ara:"
"na ɔdze nam Akrabbim no mfowee mu pomu afamu
column4: na ɔfow kɔ Kades-barnea no pomu afamu
column5: na otwa mu wɔ Hezron ho

column3: na ɔdze pue Egypt ɔwora no do; na ɔhe no n'edzifir wɔ po ho: iyi nyɛ hom pomu afamu he."

column2: "Na boka afamu he nye Nkyen Po no
column3: mekyerɛ ɔdze kodu Jordan ewiei. Na kwaamu afamu he no ofi po no ho wɔ Jordan ewiei:"
na otwa mu fa Bɛt-araba no kwaamu afamu; na ɔhe no fow kɔ Reuben ne babanyin Bohan ɔbo no ho:"

column2: "na ɔhe no fi Akor ɔbɔn mu fow kɔ Debir
column3: na ɔdze no dɛmara kɔ kwaamu afamu
column4: dze hwɛ Gilgal a ɔwɔ Adummim mfowee a ɔwɔ esutsen no no pomu afamu no tsentsendo no: na ɔhe no twa mu kɔ En-semes nsu no ho

column2: "na ɔhe no fow fa Hinom ne babanyin no bɔnsa no mu dze kodu Jebusfo nkyɛnmu wɔ pomu afamu a ɔnoara nye Jerusalɛm: na ɔhe no fow kɔ bepɔw a ɔda Hinom ɔbɔn no enyim anee afamu a ɔwɔ Refaim ɔbɔn no n'ano noho ara wɔ kwaamu afamu n'etsifi:"
"na ɔhe no hima fi bepɔw no etsifi kɔ Nefitoa nsu no no nsunyiwa ho
column3: na ɔfow kɔ Efron bepɔw do nkurow no ho; na ɔhe no hima kɔ Baala a ɔnoara nye Kiriat-jearim:"

column2: "na ɔhe no dze dan fi Baala anee afamu kɔ bepɔw Seir ho
column3: na otwa mu kɔ bepɔw Jearim ne nkyɛnmu wɔ kwaamu afamu a ɔnoara nye Kesalom
column5: na otwa mu wɔ Timna ho:"

column2: "na ɔhe no dze pue kɔ Ekron nkyɛnmu kwaamu afamu: na ɔhe no hima kɔ Sikeron
column3: na otwa mu kɔ bepɔw Baala ho
column4: na ɔdze pue wɔ Jabneel; na ɔhe no n'edzifir wɔ po no ho."

column2: "Na anee afamu ɔhe no nye po kɛse no
column3: nye ne he. Iyi nye Judamba he a otwa hyia dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee."

column2: "Na ɔmaa Jefune ba Kaleb kyɛfa wɔ Judamba no mu
column3: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE ne mbrasɛm a ɔdze maa Josua no tse
column5: Arba no a ɔyɛ Anak n'egya no a ɔnoara nye Hebron."

column2: "Na Kaleb tuu Anak ne mbabanyin baasa no fii hɔ
"Na ofi hɔ fowee kɔr Debir a nkan no na ne dzin nye Kiriat-Sefer no do."

column5: ɔno na medze me babaa Aksa bɛma no ayewar."

column2: "Na Kaleb no nua Kenaz ne babanyin Otiniel
column3: kɛgyee: na ɔdze ne babaa Aksa maa no ayewar."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a basia no baa ne nkyɛn no
column3: Otiniel nunuu no dɛ ombisa n'egya hɔ haban bi; na aber a Aksa fi n'asoaso do dwirii no; Kaleb bisaa no dɛ
Ma me akyɛdze; sɛ edze me esi Pomu afamu asaase do a
column4: nna ma me mbasu so. Na ɔdze etsifi mbasu nye anaafo mbasu no maa no."

column2: "Iyi nye Judamba ebusuakuw no hɔn egyapadze dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee."
"Na Judamba ebusuakuw no hɔn ano wɔ nkurow a odzi kɔ Edom he do wɔ Pomu afamu no nye Kabzeel

column5: nye Rimmon: nkurow no nyinara yɛ eduonu akron
nye Gederotaim; nkurow duanan ɔnye no nkuraase."

column2: "Na nkurow no bi so nye Zenan

column5: nye Makeda; nkurow duesia ɔnye no nkuraase."

column3: Akizib nye Maresa; nkurow akron nye no nkuraase."
ɔnye no ho nkurow nye no nkuraase:"

column2: "ofi Ekron araa dze kodu po no ho

column3: no ho nkurow nye no nkuraase; Gaza
column4: no ho nkurow nye no nkuraase; dze kodu Egypt ɔwora
Gilo; nkurow dubiako ɔnye no nkuraase."

column3: nye Kiriat-arba a ɔnoara nye Hebron
column4: nye Zior; nkurow akron ɔnye no nkuraase."
nye Timna; nkurow du ɔnye no nkuraase."
Eltekon; nkurow esia ɔnye no nkuraase."

column3: nye Rabaa; nkurow ebien nye no nkuraase."

column2: "Sar no do nkurow no nye Bɛt-araba

column3: Nkyen Kurow no nye Engedi; nkurow esia ɔnye no nkuraase."

column4: Judamba enntum enntu hɔn: mbom Jebusfo no wɔnye Judamba no tsenaa Jerusalɛm dze bodu ndɛ da yi."
